name: United States
interestingFact: The US has no official language at the federal level.

name: India
interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy.

name: China
interestingFact: China has the world's longest high-speed rail network.

name: United Kingdom
interestingFact: Big Ben is actually the name of the bell, not the clock tower.

name: Germany
interestingFact: Germany is home to the world's oldest brewery, founded in 1040.

name: France
interestingFact: The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller in summer due to heat expansion.

name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
